title: Verizon fios Philadelphia
body: 20 minutes ago while I was in game, my ping has jumped from 33 to 142 average ping with some packet loss.  It has still not gone down.  My ping in everything else is the same as normal.  I have verizon fios near Philadelphia.

replies.body:
I'm seeing a good deal of these Verizon Fios issue posts, and I'm really curious how your connection is looking on it's way to our servers. It's likely Verizon is having some routing issues since you mentioned having packet loss problems. 

Try using a VPN for now, and please let me know if this helps at all. This should not be a permanent solution, but only a temporary fix until all of this gets sorted out.
friend and I had the exact same issue... we average 29 ping and it jumped to 132-136 average... nothing we did to reset it would fix it...  I have a 250 Mbs package with verizon fios
JK I'm and idiot and just noticed you stated that you have verizon fios as well... it seems they may be throttling our connection to league??
It seems to be coming and going for 5-10 minutes at a time.
same problem in the area. wttfffff
Outside Phila, Verizon Fios, went from ~30 ms daily for last year to flat 140 today
Update: back to 33...hope it lasts
nope didnt last

I know that feel.... Been connecting to custom games all night hoping this will be fixed.... :( 

Guess we go play more CSGO...
For me it doesn't fade in and out, it just stays 130-200 no matter what. Riot needs to see this post
I've had the same problem all day and in some games other people have the same issue. Steady 135 ping Fios as well and live on the east coast.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EGjn4bXd-east-coast-latency-issue-verizon

Trying to consolidate all the posts. Post there and I'll try to pass it onto a Rioter.
Same and some friends as well. In Delaware and have Verizon FiOS.
Same here.. WHAT GIVES {{item:3070}}

Same, I live just north of Philly (Montco) and having similar issues. Contacted Verizon and they said they didn't see any problems on their end.

Lost two ranked placement matches because of this crap... =/

I lost one and was so pissed... checked before to make sure was working 30 ping np. Go to ranked, game crashes cuz unable to connect to server then yeah lost. Turns out have lag spikes and a zoe that can one shot you makes for an easy ranked loss.

It's very weird, because the problem just started happening to me within the past hour. Even earlier today was fine and I was playing with 30-32 ping per game. Hopefully Verizon fixes this on there end. I need to finish my promo series to diamond Q_Q
Allentown, PA .... two of us in the city, both of us have FIOS, both of normally around 30 ping.... 135-138 constant ping tonight. Seriously Verizon?
I'm from Allentown as well with FIOS, having the same problem lost 2 ranked thanks to Verizon
This problem has been fixed as of 00:19 1/22/2018 EST. Just logged on and played a game to test it and I have Verizon Gigabit.

Same issue--- 137 ping the entire game--- FIOS/northern Virginia.

HOW MANY PEOPLE HAVE FIOS AND LIVE IN EITHER NORTHERN VA OR PENNSYLVANIA??


Easy way to pinpoint the affected areas.
I'm Maryland, basically same but just saying it's beyond just Northern Virginia.
